scripts.lerna:publish: yarn run lerna:prepublish && npx lerna publish
scripts.prepublishOnly_: yarn run ncu && yarn run sort-package-json && yarn run test
scripts.ci:install: yarn add -W -D typescript@next ts-node yarn-tool lerna --prefer-offline
scripts.ci:test: yt ws run --scope ynpx prepublishOnly & yt ws run --scope ynpx test
scripts.ncu: yarn run ncu:root && yarn run ncu:ws
scripts.ncu:ws: npx yarn-tool ws exec yarn-tool ncu -- -u
scripts.sort-package-json: yarn run sort-package-json:root && yarn run sort-package-json:ws
scripts.sort-package-json:ws: npx yarn-tool ws exec yarn-tool sort
